avg_trial_execution_time.title: Average duration of trial training
avg_trial_execution_time.y-label: Average trial traing time in sec
avg_trial_execution_time.description: In comparision to the avg trial training by no limit tuning scalability,the diffrence between katib and polyaxon is much smaller still a little bit unexpeted the the avg are not equel withch they schould toerticly be, as every trial executes the same amount of work . Simmilar patter of rising avg time is hear to see, the time stay about equel up to 5 trials runing in parralle than we habe a rise up to 8-9 trials and again up 10 to 20 trials we agingo upwards
